featured.text: But what they do not realize is that overtreatment—too many scans, too many blood tests, too many procedures—may pose harm.
Pumping this super-salty water back into the ocean can harm local aquatic life.
Overall, most people simply aren’t exercising or moving around enough to counteract all the harm that can result from sitting nine hours or more a day.
Given the harm caused by the burning of medical waste, physicians and nurses have the responsibility to take a lead in reducing the use of plastics in the hospitals.
You needn’t worry about the harm of a sedentary lifestyle because you exercise regularly, right?

definition.en_def: Physical or mental injury or damage.
definition.example: The storm caused significant harm to the coastal community.
